name: Yily (Arydev, Kapden, Juan Rodrigues)
description:
Yily is a famyly game made by arydev Madhav Kapden and Juan for Godot Game Jam

is a multiplayer game running on on pc where you play as Petro or his frend 

we tooked the family theme to another level so our caracters  are dinos.

the game is in a 1 bit stile .
